episode: The Trump administration wrongfully deported a US citizen

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Did you see the story about the wrongful deportation?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I haven't seen that one, could you fill me in?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The Trump administration got an Ecuadorean man wrongly deported

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really unfortunate. How's he doing now?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: They're not letting him come back

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awful. Hope he finds support!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's hard to beat the US government

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Indeed, challenging system. Stay hopeful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm beginning to lose hope

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Understandable, but keep faith!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: This administration is just so evil

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's truly disheartening.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Trump should deport his own wife

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a strong statement.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It crazy how hypocritical they are

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Hypocrisy can be frustrating.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm also mad at the Democrats for letting all this happen

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's tough when both sides disappoint.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It just feels like we're all screwed

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's indeed a challenging time.
